properties.areaDesc: Mexico Bay NY to the St. Lawrence River beyond 5NM off shoreline to US-Canadian border; Sodus Bay to Mexico Bay NY beyond 5NM off shoreline to US-Canadian border; Hamlin Beach to Sodus Bay NY beyond 5NM off shoreline to US-Canadian border
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 11 at 4:45AM EST until January 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds to 40 knots and waves 11 to 15 feet expected.

* WHERE...The open waters of Lake Ontario from Hamlin Beach to
the Saint Lawrence River.

* WHEN...From 9 AM to 4 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 4 PM EST SUNDAY
